ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Clerics soloing?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a level 40 cleric now and I can solo blue and stuff. Lightcrawlers and such in dawnshroud around level 34 35 I was soloing pretty easily. Took up all my
ygData.messageBody:
I have a level 40 cleric now and I can solo blue and stuff. Lightcrawlers and such in dawnshroud around level 34 35 I was soloing pretty easily. Took up all my mana though.




~+~Billy Simmons~+~
>From: "Ganlet"
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To:
>Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Clerics soloing?
>Date: Wed, 16 Jan 2002 08:23:27 -0600
>
>Ummmmmm I believe you are forgetting Mages :)
>I've soloed at every level 1-50(almost 51) and I'm very good at it.
>
>Ganlet
>50th Mage On Brell
>Rocker of Socks
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: LAINE. Mikael (Nol) [mailto:laine@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, January 16, 2002 6:10 AM
>To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
>Subject: SV: [EverQuest] Clerics soloing?
>
>"i've gotta give all the other non-necro classes
>a hard time about soloing"
>
>I don't really agree with that, well, maybe at lvl 20 to 50. Post 50 the
>best solo classes are necros, shamans and enchanters.
>-domi
>
>-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
>Fr�n: Jeff Gaudry [mailto:bgrifter@...]
>Skickat: Wednesday, January 16, 2002 12:46 PM
>Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>�mne: [EverQuest] Clerics soloing?
>
>
> >In Kelethin a similar way is to buy CB belts and
> >turn them in in Kaladim. But to get good skills, get
> >in a group and fight on orc hill up to lvl 8
> >then go into CB. Btw, anyone know of a good place a
> >lvl 36 high elf cleric can solo?
>
>I'll go the obvious route here, "Cleric? Solo?
>Bwahahahahahahahahahaha...". ;) (hey, my main's a
>druid, i've gotta give all the other non-necro classes
>a hard time about soloing :) Honestly, from what I
>understand (having a friend with a lvl 30 Cleric and
>having talked to/grouped with others), Clerics just
>plain don't solo past 20. It shouldn't be too hard to
>find a group though, Clerics of a decent level are
>always in short supply. I'd be inclined to head
>somewhere like Cazic-Thule or Guk. Plenty of yummy
>undead in LGuk, just shout LFG there and max out your
>"Ego" skill while everyone fights over you. :) Of
>course, if you absolutely insist on soloing, hit
>eqatlas.com and take your pick of the 30+ undead heavy
>zones. Personally, i'd rather have a pet warrior or
>two around to soak up the damage though... :)
>
